com.bdtripp.hauntedhouse

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bdtripp.hauntedhouse.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Player - a player in the game. This class is part of the "Haunted House" application. "Haunted House" is a text based adventure game. A "Player" represents a player in the game and keeps track of where the player is, what items they are carrying, and their current stats.
